DOC.brief_summary: This study is being done to measure the amount of skin shrinkage caused by a non-invasive skin tightening device.
DOC.brief_title: Quantitative Evaluation of Skin Shrinkage Caused by a Non-invasive Tightening Device
DOC.criteria: Age 3060 y/o Mild to moderate laxity of arm skin Skin of Fitzpatrick levels IIII Any active local arm infections Scarring or abnormalities in upper arm area Major systemic illnesses Any condition with delayed wound healing History of psychiatrist illnesses
DOC.keyword: None- Normal healthy upper arm skin will be used.
